short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DrumCV uses AI to help customer support agents fill out drop-down fields in their ticket system faster, easier, and better.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It takes 15 seconds to install.

REQUIREMENTS
A DrumCV account is required to use this extension, as well as an account with one of the following ticket systems:
- HubSpot (Service Hub)
- Zendesk

WHAT CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING
“This browser extension helps us save time and improve data quality when filling out tickets. Simple and effective ROI, especially when setup time is less than 15 seconds.”

FEATURES INCLUDE
- AI-sorted drop-down fields based on your text inputs
- Powerful search bar and filtering that helps you search within drop-down fields
- One-click select that fills out drop-down fields for you

HAVE QUESTIONS?
Learn more about DrumCV at http://www.drumcv.com/.
If you have any problems or suggestions please visit http://www.drumcv.com/ and chat with us.
